file_content.text: I'm... dying. Must reach the... detonator. Try... to complete... mission....
That will not be permitted.
Not allowed. [Kill soldier]
I'm a gambler. Try it.
Go ahead.
For the... Republic.... Blast. What... a waste....
Consider this a mercy killing.
Sad sight. [Kill soldier]
Aggghhh.
Uh... ah... must... detonate...! Work, blast it... work...!
This is a mercy killing.
Sad sight. [Kill Trey-yen]
Your detonator is broken, Captain.
It's no use.
Don't... understand. We did... everything right. I die... unfulfilled....
Your persistence is annoying!
Die, idiot! [Kill Trey-yen]
Has our mysterious problem been solved? Are we active?
Sir, best guess is yes. All systems appear to be online. Your detonator should be live.
Then let's pack up. We'll blow this cavern and the Imperial Command center sky high.
You're not going anywhere.
Not so fast.
Only cowards fight from the shadows.
You're spineless.
I'm here to convince you to abandon this mission.
Let's talk this over.
Too late, we've been discovered!
Stow it! We knew this was a possibility. Sith, I'm prepared to detonate even if it means we all die.
You've just wandered into your own funeral! Throwing the switch!
What? No! Come on, detonate! Detonate, aaarrrgh!
If you want to die, let me oblige you.
I'll kill you. [Attack]
Men, hold the line! I'll try a reset!
Give up this mission and live to fight another day.
It's useless, just leave.
No. We live and die as heroes of the Republic.
Men, buy me time to reset the detonator.
Today is not your day.
How unlucky.
Men, this mission is everything. It will win Quesh for the Republic. We will be immortalized as heroes!
I order you to hold off the Sith while I reset the detonator!
There will be no detonation.
Die, Captain. [Choke Trey-yen]
Ack...! Ack...!
Uh... okay, in my humble opinion, this mission is a bust. We... we'd like to just leave now. Please.
No one leaves alive.
No. [Attack]
Fight for your lives!
Do it fast, or else.
Leaving!
You may leave with your lives.
Of course.
I'm not waiting around to be attacked.
Allow me. [Attack]
Attacking me so you can just die in a massive explosion is senseless.
Don't be stupid.
Uh, yeah, wait a minute, the Sith's right--that doesn't sound too good.
Where's your confidence, Corporal? All you have to do is kill the Sith, and we can blow this cavern from afar.
Yeah, I'm thinking killing the Sith is a bit beyond our skill set. Sir.
A very wise assessment, Corporal.
Smart man.
The offer is about to expire.
I'm getting impatient.
Come on, men, our work's done here. Well, not so much done as over.
Fools! This mission is critical! Work, blast it, work!
Run away and join your men, Captain.
Give it up.
Your stubbornness has proven fatal.
Die, Captain. [Kill Trey-yen]
For the Republic....
Get it through your head--your detonator doesn't work.
It's broken, idiot.
Useless piece of junk! Fine. I'll seek glory elsewhere. Goodbye, Sith.
Well well well. Well done. Mission accomplished, eh?
The threat is over.
That's right.
There never was a threat, friend.
Why are you bothering me?
What's it to you, Draahg?
I have a mission of my own, friend.
Were you eavesdropping somehow?
How did you know?
As a matter of fact, I was.
Captain Trey-yen was sent here by one of Baras's Republic moles. The explosives he set up were not wired to the captain's detonator.
I have the real detonator. An elaborate trap for you.
So, Baras is stabbing me in the back.
I'm being betrayed.
Are you acting on your own, Draahg, or did Baras give the order?
Who authorized this?
I don't do anything unless he commands it. That's the difference between us.
I'm going to kill you, Draahg.
You're dead.
That would be an amazing trick.
Our master prides himself on being one step ahead of everyone. That includes you. He knew someday you would rise against him.
You were his fiercest. I consider it a privilege that he's allowed me to pull the trigger.
He wouldn't dare face me himself.
He's a coward.
The master never takes out the trash.
Be a man and face me in the flesh.
Come here and fight me.
While the thought of personally beheading you is a delight, we're leaving nothing to chance.
This will be your fate one day, Draahg.
He'll betray you, too.
You let me worry about that.
Baras sends his regards. Goodbye.
Interest justified. Shall I revive?
Offer no help. We must be sure.
If she survives the trek to safety, then her worth will be established.
His worth will be established by surviving the trek to safety.
We will wait at the command center exactly one day for our proof.
Her associate is about to expire. Take the body.
His associate is about to expire. Take the body.
It's easier to just kill you all.
Forget it. [Attack]
Defend my position!
